channel.title: Version 2.5 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 2.5.0 (2021-10-08) Change Change New colors --CODE-BLOCK-color and --CODE-BLOCK-BG-color were added to provide a fallback for Hugoâ€™s syntax highlighting in case no language was given or the language is unsupported. Ideally the colors are set to the same values as the ones from your chosen chroma style.
